pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Dicom-To-CNNInstall : pip install dicom-to-cnn Features : - Description of Series content in a huge dataset of DICOM (output JSON descriptor for each series containings main DICOM tags).- Conversion : - Dicom to Nifti - Mask to RTSS and DICOMSeg - RTSS to mask - DicomSeg to mask - PET/CT - Conversion Bqml/Counts to SUV and SUL - Fusion#Maintainer : Salim Kanoun#Contributors : Thomas Trouillard, Wendy Revailler
